appName.message: Taofia siusiu - animations mo lau isumu
appName.description: O le ulutala o le talosaga, faʻaalia i totonu o le upega tafailagi.

appDesc.message: Faʻaopopoina malie aʻafiaga i soʻo se taimi e te siʻi ai lou isumu.O lenei faʻaopopoga faia lou isumu agai i luma e maua ai aʻafiaga malie.
appDesc.description: O le faʻamatalaga o le talosaga, faʻaalia i totonu o le upega tafailagi.

stopExtension.description: A kiliki, o le faʻaopopoga e le atoatoa seʻia oʻo ina tau

startExtension.description: A kiliki, o le faʻaopoopoga mafai ona mafai ona faʻamutaina le faʻamamaina.

popupTitle.description: O le taʻele pe a tatalaina le faʻamalama appup.

ratingBtn.description: O le faʻamau matala le faʻamalama fou e faʻatatau ai le faʻaopopoga mo le tagata faʻaaoga.

askQuestion.message: Na e fiafia i le faaopoopoga?
askQuestion.description: O le feʻau alele e tupu pe a oʻo i le tagata faʻaaoga i le 3 aso.

ratingQuestion.message:
Faafetai mo le fiafia!
 Faʻamolemole o loʻo avea le faʻalauteleina!
ratingQuestion.description: O le feʻau alele e tupu pe a oʻo i le tagata faʻaaoga i le 3 aso.
